entries.title: Elon Musk Announces New Twitter Policy to Follow and Question Science
entries.description: Elon Musk's Twitter profile on a smartphone placed on printed Twitter logos on April 28, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)

entries.title: Apple Being Sued by New Yorker Alleging ‘Racial Bias’ Against Minorities on Watch’s Blood Oximeter
entries.description: Apple's Deidre Caldbeck showcases the enhanced features of the new Apple Watch lineup during a special event at Apple Park in Cupertino, Calif., on Sept. 7, 2022. (Brooks Kraft/Apple Inc./Handout via Reuters)

entries.title: Ron DeSantis Offered LibsofTikTok Refuge in Governor’s Mansion During Doxxing Threat
entries.description: The logo for social media app TikTok is displayed on the screen of an iPhone on an American flag background in Arlington, Va., on Aug. 3, 2020. (Olivier Douliery/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Hacker Claims to Be Selling Personal Data of 400 Million Twitter Users
entries.description: The Twitter logo is displayed on a mobile device in London on Nov. 7, 2013. (Photo by Bethany Clarke/Getty Images)
